text: 1.9-10 Apo 19.21, Lom 15.23, 15.32, 2 Ko 1.23, Epe 1.16, Plp 1.8, 1 Te 2.5, 2.10, 3.10, 2 Ti 1.3, Jem 4.15 Wog nop ak kɨles gɨl gɨñɨlɨg, Ñɨne nop takaw teplep ak agñɨbin. Pen God ne nɨg mɨdaknɨŋ, yad nɨbop nen agɨl pel God nop agnepin. Nɨbop am nɨgin agɨl, kɨles gɨl God nop pel agnepin. Anɨb ak, yɨp yaw agɨl kanɨb yomek, mɨdebɨm ak nɨnɨgayn.
